verses.translation: Then he became a clot; then (Allah) shaped and fashioned

verses.content: فَجَعَلَ مِنْهُ الزَّوْجَيْنِ الذَّكَرَ وَالْأُنثَىٰ
verses.translation: And made of him a pair, the male and female.

verses.content: أَلَيْسَ ذَٰلِكَ بِقَادِرٍ عَلَىٰ أَن يُحْيِيَ الْمَوْتَىٰ
verses.translation: Is not He (Who doeth so) Able to bring the dead to life?

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ هَلْ أَتَىٰ عَلَى الْإِنسَانِ حِينٌ مِّنَ الدَّهْرِ لَمْ يَكُن شَيْئًا مَّذْكُورًا
verses.translation: Hath there come upon man (ever) any period of time in which he was a thing unremembered?

verses.content: إِنَّا خَلَقْنَا الْإِنسَانَ مِن نُّطْفَةٍ أَمْشَاجٍ نَّبْتَلِيهِ فَجَعَلْنَاهُ سَمِيعًا بَصِيرًا
verses.translation: Lo! We create man from a drop of thickened fluid to test him; so We make him hearing, knowing.

verses.content: إِنَّا هَدَيْنَاهُ السَّبِيلَ إِمَّا شَاكِرًا وَإِمَّا كَفُورًا
verses.translation: Lo! We have shown him the way, whether he be grateful or disbelieving.

verses.content: إِنَّا أَعْتَدْنَا لِلْكَافِرِينَ سَلَاسِلَ وَأَغْلَالًا وَسَعِيرًا
verses.translation: Lo! We have prepared for disbelievers manacles and carcans and a raging fire.

verses.content: إِنَّ الْأَبْرَارَ يَشْرَبُونَ مِن كَأْسٍ كَانَ مِزَاجُهَا كَافُورًا
verses.translation: Lo! the righteous shall drink of a cup whereof the mixture is of Kafur,

verses.content: عَيْنًا يَشْرَبُ بِهَا عِبَادُ اللَّهِ يُفَجِّرُونَهَا تَفْجِيرًا
verses.translation: A spring wherefrom the slaves of Allah drink, making it gush forth abundantly,

verses.content: يُوفُونَ بِالنَّذْرِ وَيَخَافُونَ يَوْمًا كَانَ شَرُّهُ مُسْتَطِيرًا
verses.translation: (Because) they perform the vow and fear a day whereof the evil is wide-spreading,

verses.content: وَيُطْعِمُونَ الطَّعَامَ عَلَىٰ حُبِّهِ مِسْكِينًا وَيَتِيمًا وَأَسِيرًا
verses.translation: And feed with food the needy wretch, the orphan and the prisoner, for love of Him,

verses.content: إِنَّمَا نُطْعِمُكُمْ لِوَجْهِ اللَّهِ لَا نُرِيدُ مِنكُمْ جَزَاءً وَلَا شُكُورًا
verses.translation: (Saying): We feed you, for the sake of Allah only. We wish for no reward nor thanks from you;

verses.content: إِنَّا نَخَافُ مِن رَّبِّنَا يَوْمًا عَبُوسًا قَمْطَرِيرًا
verses.translation: Lo! we fear from our Lord a day of frowning and of fate.

verses.content: فَوَقَاهُمُ اللَّهُ شَرَّ ذَٰلِكَ الْيَوْمِ وَلَقَّاهُمْ نَضْرَةً وَسُرُورًا
verses.translation: Therefor Allah hath warded off from them the evil of that day, and hath made them find brightness and joy;

verses.content: وَجَزَاهُم بِمَا صَبَرُوا جَنَّةً وَحَرِيرًا
verses.translation: And hath awarded them for all that they endured, a Garden and silk attire;

verses.content: مُّتَّكِئِينَ فِيهَا عَلَى الْأَرَائِكِ ۖ لَا يَرَوْنَ فِيهَا شَمْسًا وَلَا زَمْهَرِيرًا
verses.translation: Reclining therein upon couches, they will find there neither (heat of) a sun nor bitter cold.

verses.content: وَدَانِيَةً عَلَيْهِمْ ظِلَالُهَا وَذُلِّلَتْ قُطُوفُهَا تَذْلِيلًا
verses.translation: The shade thereof is close upon them and the clustered fruits thereof bow down.

verses.content: وَيُطَافُ عَلَيْهِم بِآنِيَةٍ مِّن فِضَّةٍ وَأَكْوَابٍ كَانَتْ قَوَارِيرَا
verses.translation: Goblets of silver are brought round for them, and beakers (as) of glass

verses.content: قَوَارِيرَ مِن فِضَّةٍ قَدَّرُوهَا تَقْدِيرًا
verses.translation: (Bright as) glass but (made) of silver, which they (themselves) have measured to the measure (of their deeds).

verses.content: وَيُسْقَوْنَ فِيهَا كَأْسًا كَانَ مِزَاجُهَا زَنجَبِيلًا
verses.translation: There are they watered with a cup whereof the mixture is of Zanjabil,

verses.content: عَيْنًا فِيهَا تُسَمَّىٰ سَلْسَبِيلًا
verses.translation: (The water of) a spring therein, named Salsabil.

verses.content: وَيَطُوفُ عَلَيْهِمْ وِلْدَانٌ مُّخَلَّدُونَ إِذَا رَأَيْتَهُمْ حَسِبْتَهُمْ لُؤْلُؤًا مَّنثُورًا
verses.translation: There wait on them immortal youths, whom, when thou seest, thou wouldst take for scattered pearls.

verses.content: وَإِذَا رَأَيْتَ ثَمَّ رَأَيْتَ نَعِيمًا وَمُلْكًا كَبِيرًا
verses.translation: When thou seest, thou wilt see there bliss and high estate.

verses.content: عَالِيَهُمْ ثِيَابُ سُندُسٍ خُضْرٌ وَإِسْتَبْرَقٌ ۖ وَحُلُّوا أَسَاوِرَ مِن فِضَّةٍ وَسَقَاهُمْ رَبُّهُمْ شَرَابًا طَهُورًا
verses.translation: Their raiment will be fine green silk and gold embroidery. Bracelets of silver will they wear. Their Lord will slake their thirst with a pure drink.

verses.content: إِنَّ هَـٰذَا كَانَ لَكُمْ جَزَاءً وَكَانَ سَعْيُكُم مَّشْكُورًا
verses.translation: (And it will be said unto them): Lo! this is a reward for you. Your endeavour (upon earth) hath found acceptance.

verses.content: إِنَّا نَحْنُ نَزَّلْنَا عَلَيْكَ الْقُرْآنَ تَنزِيلًا
verses.translation: Lo! We, even We, have revealed unto thee the Qur'an, a revelation;

verses.content: فَاصْبِرْ لِحُكْمِ رَبِّكَ وَلَا تُطِعْ مِنْهُمْ آثِمًا أَوْ كَفُورًا
verses.translation: So submit patiently to thy Lord's command, and obey not of them any guilty one or disbeliever.

verses.content: وَاذْكُرِ اسْمَ رَبِّكَ بُكْرَةً وَأَصِيلًا
verses.translation: Remember the name of thy Lord at morn and evening.

verses.content: وَمِنَ اللَّيْلِ فَاسْجُدْ لَهُ وَسَبِّحْهُ لَيْلًا طَوِيلًا
verses.translation: And worship Him (a portion) of the night. And glorify Him through the livelong night.

verses.content: إِنَّ هَـٰؤُلَاءِ يُحِبُّونَ الْعَاجِلَةَ وَيَذَرُونَ وَرَاءَهُمْ يَوْمًا ثَقِيلًا
verses.translation: Lo! these love fleeting life, and put behind them (the remembrance of) a grievous day.

verses.content: نَّحْنُ خَلَقْنَاهُمْ وَشَدَدْنَا أَسْرَهُمْ ۖ وَإِذَا شِئْنَا بَدَّلْنَا أَمْثَالَهُمْ تَبْدِيلًا
verses.translation: We, even We, created them, and strengthened their frame. And when We will, We can replace them, bringing others like them in their stead.

verses.content: إِنَّ هَـٰذِهِ تَذْكِرَةٌ ۖ فَمَن شَاءَ اتَّخَذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِ سَبِيلًا
verses.translation: Lo! this is an Admonishment, that whosoever will may choose a way unto his Lord.

verses.content: وَمَا تَشَاءُونَ إِلَّا أَن يَشَاءَ اللَّهُ ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ كَانَ عَلِيمًا حَكِيمًا
verses.translation: Yet ye will not, unless Allah willeth. Lo! Allah is Knower, Wise.

verses.content: يُدْخِلُ مَن يَشَاءُ فِي رَحْمَتِهِ ۚ وَالظَّالِمِينَ أَعَدَّ لَهُمْ عَذَابًا أَلِيمًا
verses.translation: He maketh whom He will to enter His mercy, and for evil-doers hath prepared a painful doom.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَالْمُرْسَلَاتِ عُرْفًا
verses.translation: By the emissary winds, (sent) one after another

verses.content: فَالْعَاصِفَاتِ عَصْفًا
verses.translation: By the raging hurricanes,

verses.content: وَالنَّاشِرَاتِ نَشْرًا
verses.translation: By those which cause earth's vegetation to revive;

verses.content: فَالْفَارِقَاتِ فَرْقًا
verses.translation: By those who winnow with a winnowing,

verses.content: فَالْمُلْقِيَاتِ ذِكْرًا
verses.translation: By those who bring down the Reminder,

verses.content: عُذْرًا أَوْ نُذْرًا
verses.translation: To excuse or to warn,

verses.content: إِنَّمَا تُوعَدُونَ لَوَاقِعٌ
verses.translation: Surely that which ye are promised will befall.

verses.content: فَإِذَا النُّجُومُ طُمِسَتْ
verses.translation: So when the stars are put out,

verses.content: وَإِذَا السَّمَاءُ فُرِجَتْ
verses.translation: And when the sky is riven asunder,

verses.content: وَإِذَا الْجِبَالُ نُسِفَتْ
verses.translation: And when the mountains are blown away,

verses.content: وَإِذَا الرُّسُلُ أُقِّتَتْ
verses.translation: And when the messengers are brought unto their time appointed -

verses.content: لِأَيِّ يَوْمٍ أُجِّلَتْ
verses.translation: For what day is the time appointed?

verses.content: لِيَوْمِ الْفَصْلِ
verses.translation: For the Day of Decision.

verses.content: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا يَوْمُ الْفَصْلِ
verses.translation: And what will convey unto thee what the Day of Decision is! -

verses.content: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.translation: Woe unto the repudiators on that day!

verses.content: أَلَمْ نُهْلِكِ الْأَوَّلِينَ
verses.translation: Destroyed We not the former folk,

verses.content: ثُمَّ نُتْبِعُهُمُ الْآخِرِينَ
verses.translation: Then caused the latter folk to follow after?

verses.content: كَذَٰلِكَ نَفْعَلُ بِالْمُجْرِمِينَ
verses.translation: Thus deal We ever with the guilty.

verses.content: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.translation: Woe unto the repudiators on that day!

verses.content: أَلَمْ نَخْلُقكُّم مِّن مَّاءٍ مَّهِينٍ
verses.translation: Did We not create you from a base fluid

verses.content: فَجَعَلْنَاهُ فِي قَرَارٍ مَّكِينٍ
verses.translation: Which We laid up in a safe abode

verses.content: إِلَىٰ قَدَرٍ مَّعْلُومٍ
verses.translation: For a known term?

verses.content: فَقَدَرْنَا فَنِعْمَ الْقَادِرُونَ
verses.translation: Thus We arranged. How excellent is Our arranging!

verses.content: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.translation: Woe unto the repudiators on that day!

verses.content: أَلَمْ نَجْعَلِ الْأَرْضَ كِفَاتًا
verses.translation: Have We not made the earth a receptacle

verses.content: أَحْيَاءً وَأَمْوَاتًا
verses.translation: Both for the living and the dead,

verses.content: وَجَعَلْنَا فِيهَا رَوَاسِيَ شَامِخَاتٍ وَأَسْقَيْنَاكُم مَّاءً فُرَاتًا
verses.translation: And placed therein high mountains and given you to drink sweet water therein?

verses.content: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.translation: Woe unto the repudiators on that day!

verses.content: انطَلِقُوا إِلَىٰ مَا كُنتُم بِهِ تُكَذِّبُونَ
verses.translation: (It will be said unto them:) Depart unto that (doom) which ye used to deny;

verses.content: انطَلِقُوا إِلَىٰ ظِلٍّ ذِي ثَلَاثِ شُعَبٍ
verses.translation: Depart unto the shadow falling threefold,

verses.content: لَّا ظَلِيلٍ وَلَا يُغْنِي مِنَ اللَّهَبِ
verses.translation: (Which yet is) no relief nor shelter from the flame.

verses.content: إِنَّهَا تَرْمِي بِشَرَرٍ كَالْقَصْرِ
verses.translation: Lo! it throweth up sparks like the castles,

verses.content: كَأَنَّهُ جِمَالَتٌ صُفْرٌ
verses.translation: (Or) as it might be camels of bright yellow hue.

verses.content: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.translation: Woe unto the repudiators on that day!

verses.content: هَـٰذَا يَوْمُ لَا يَنطِقُونَ
verses.translation: This is a day wherein they speak not,

verses.content: وَلَا يُؤْذَنُ لَهُمْ فَيَعْتَذِرُونَ
verses.translation: Nor are they suffered to put forth excuses.

verses.content: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.translation: Woe unto the repudiators on that day!

verses.content: هَـٰذَا يَوْمُ الْفَصْلِ ۖ جَمَعْنَاكُمْ وَالْأَوَّلِينَ
verses.translation: This is the Day of Decision, We have brought you and the men of old together.

verses.content: فَإِن كَانَ لَكُمْ كَيْدٌ فَكِيدُونِ
verses.translation: If now ye have any wit, outwit Me.

verses.content: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.translation: Woe unto the repudiators on that day!

verses.content: إِنَّ الْمُتَّقِينَ فِي ظِلَالٍ وَعُيُونٍ
verses.translation: Lo! those who kept their duty are amid shade and fountains,

verses.content: وَفَوَاكِهَ مِمَّا يَشْتَهُونَ
verses.translation: And fruits such as they desire.

verses.content: كُلُوا وَاشْرَبُوا هَنِيئًا بِمَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
verses.translation: (Unto them it is said:) Eat, drink and welcome, O ye blessed, in return for what ye did.

verses.content: إِنَّا كَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِي الْمُحْسِنِينَ
verses.translation: Thus do We reward the good.

verses.content: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.translation: Woe unto the repudiators on that day!

verses.content: كُلُوا وَتَمَتَّعُوا قَلِيلًا إِنَّكُم مُّجْرِمُونَ
verses.translation: Eat and take your ease (on earth) a little. Lo! ye are guilty.

verses.content: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.translation: Woe unto the repudiators on that day!

verses.content: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمُ ارْكَعُوا لَا يَرْكَعُونَ
verses.translation: When it is said unto them: Bow down, they bow not down!

verses.content: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.translation: Woe unto the repudiators on that day!

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ حَدِيثٍ بَعْدَهُ يُؤْمِنُونَ
verses.translation: In what statement, after this, will they believe?

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ عَمَّ يَتَسَاءَلُونَ
verses.translation: Whereof do they question one another?

verses.content: عَنِ النَّبَإِ الْعَظِيمِ
verses.translation: (It is) of the awful tidings,

verses.content: الَّذِي هُمْ فِيهِ مُخْتَلِفُونَ
verses.translation: Concerning which they are in disagreement.

verses.content: كَلَّا سَيَعْلَمُونَ
verses.translation: Nay, but they will come to know!

verses.content: ثُمَّ كَلَّا سَيَعْلَمُونَ
verses.translation: Nay, again, but they will come to know!

verses.content: أَلَمْ نَجْعَلِ الْأَرْضَ مِهَادًا
verses.translation: Have We not made the earth an expanse,

verses.content: وَالْجِبَالَ أَوْتَادًا
verses.translation: And the high hills bulwarks?

verses.content: وَخَلَقْنَاكُمْ أَزْوَاجًا
verses.translation: And We have created you in pairs,

verses.content: وَجَعَلْنَا نَوْمَكُمْ سُبَاتًا
verses.translation: And have appointed your sleep for repose,

verses.content: وَجَعَلْنَا اللَّيْلَ لِبَاسًا
verses.translation: And have appointed the night as a cloak,

verses.content: وَجَعَلْنَا النَّهَارَ مَعَاشًا
verses.translation: And have appointed the day for livelihood.

verses.content: وَبَنَيْنَا فَوْقَكُمْ سَبْعًا شِدَادًا
verses.translation: And We have built above you seven strong (heavens),

verses.content: وَجَعَلْنَا سِرَاجًا وَهَّاجًا
verses.translation: And have appointed a dazzling lamp,

verses.content: وَأَنزَلْنَا مِنَ الْمُعْصِرَاتِ مَاءً ثَجَّاجًا
verses.translation: And have sent down from the rainy clouds abundant water,

verses.content: لِّنُخْرِجَ بِهِ حَبًّا وَنَبَاتًا
verses.translation: Thereby to produce grain and plant,

verses.content: وَجَنَّاتٍ أَلْفَافًا
verses.translation: And gardens of thick foliage.

verses.content: إِنَّ يَوْمَ الْفَصْلِ كَانَ مِيقَاتًا
verses.translation: Lo! the Day of Decision is a fixed time,

verses.content: يَوْمَ يُنفَخُ فِي الصُّورِ فَتَأْتُونَ أَفْوَاجًا
verses.translation: A day when the trumpet is blown and ye come in multitudes,

verses.content: وَفُتِحَتِ السَّمَاءُ فَكَانَتْ أَبْوَابًا
verses.translation: And the heaven is opened and becometh as gates,

verses.content: وَسُيِّرَتِ الْجِبَالُ فَكَانَتْ سَرَابًا
verses.translation: And the hills are set in motion and become as a mirage.

verses.content: إِنَّ جَهَنَّمَ كَانَتْ مِرْصَادًا
verses.translation: Lo! hell lurketh in ambush,

verses.content: لِّلطَّاغِينَ مَآبًا
verses.translation: A home for the rebellious.

verses.content: لَّابِثِينَ فِيهَا أَحْقَابًا
verses.translation: They will abide therein for ages.

verses.content: لَّا يَذُوقُونَ فِيهَا بَرْدًا وَلَا شَرَابًا
verses.translation: Therein taste they neither coolness nor (any) drink

verses.content: إِلَّا حَمِيمًا وَغَسَّاقًا
verses.translation: Save boiling water and a paralysing cold:

verses.content: جَزَاءً وِفَاقًا
verses.translation: Reward proportioned (to their evil deeds).

verses.content: إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا لَا يَرْجُونَ حِسَابًا
verses.translation: For lo! they looked not for a reckoning;

verses.content: وَكَذَّبُوا بِآيَاتِنَا كِذَّابًا
verses.translation: They called Our revelations false with strong denial.

verses.content: وَكُلَّ شَيْءٍ أَحْصَيْنَاهُ كِتَابًا
verses.translation: Everything have We recorded in a Book.

verses.content: فَذُوقُوا فَلَن نَّزِيدَكُمْ إِلَّا عَذَابًا
verses.translation: So taste (of that which ye have earned). No increase do We give you save of torment.

verses.content: إِنَّ لِلْمُتَّقِينَ مَفَازًا
verses.translation: Lo! for the duteous is achievement -

verses.content: حَدَائِقَ وَأَعْنَابًا
verses.translation: Gardens enclosed and vineyards,

verses.content: وَكَوَاعِبَ أَتْرَابًا
verses.translation: And voluptuous women of equal age;

verses.content: وَكَأْسًا دِهَاقًا
verses.translation: And a full cup.

verses.content: لَّا يَسْمَعُونَ فِيهَا لَغْوًا وَلَا كِذَّابًا
verses.translation: There hear they never vain discourse, nor lying -

verses.content: جَزَاءً مِّن رَّبِّكَ عَطَاءً حِسَابًا
verses.translation: Requital from thy Lord - a gift in payment -

verses.content: رَّبِّ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا الرَّحْمَـٰنِ ۖ لَا يَمْلِكُونَ مِنْهُ خِطَابًا
verses.translation: Lord of the heavens and the earth, and (all) that is between them, the Beneficent; with Whom none can converse.

verses.content: يَوْمَ يَقُومُ الرُّوحُ وَالْمَلَائِكَةُ صَفًّا ۖ لَّا يَتَكَلَّمُونَ إِلَّا مَنْ أَذِنَ لَهُ الرَّحْمَـٰنُ وَقَالَ صَوَابًا
verses.translation: On the day when the angels and the Spirit stand arrayed, they speak not, saving him whom the Beneficent alloweth and who speaketh right.

verses.content: ذَٰلِكَ الْيَوْمُ الْحَقُّ ۖ فَمَن شَاءَ اتَّخَذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِ مَآبًا
verses.translation: That is the True Day. So whoso will should seek recourse unto his Lord.

verses.content: إِنَّا أَنذَرْنَاكُمْ عَذَابًا قَرِيبًا يَوْمَ يَنظُرُ الْمَرْءُ مَا قَدَّمَتْ يَدَاهُ وَيَقُولُ الْكَافِرُ يَا لَيْتَنِي كُنتُ تُرَابًا
verses.translation: Lo! We warn you of a doom at hand, a day whereon a man will look on that which his own hands have sent before, and the disbeliever will cry: "Would that I were dust!"

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَالنَّازِعَاتِ غَرْقًا
verses.translation: By those who drag forth to destruction,

verses.content: وَالنَّاشِطَاتِ نَشْطًا
verses.translation: By the meteors rushing,

verses.content: وَالسَّابِحَاتِ سَبْحًا
verses.translation: By the lone stars floating,

verses.content: فَالسَّابِقَاتِ سَبْقًا
verses.translation: By the angels hastening,

verses.content: فَالْمُدَبِّرَاتِ أَمْرًا
verses.translation: And those who govern the event,

verses.content: يَوْمَ تَرْجُفُ الرَّاجِفَةُ
verses.translation: On the day when the first trump resoundeth.

verses.content: تَتْبَعُهَا الرَّادِفَةُ
verses.translation: And the second followeth it,

verses.content: قُلُوبٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ وَاجِفَةٌ
verses.translation: On that day hearts beat painfully

verses.content: أَبْصَارُهَا خَاشِعَةٌ
verses.translation: While eyes are downcast

verses.content: يَقُولُونَ أَإِنَّا لَمَرْدُودُونَ فِي الْحَافِرَةِ
verses.translation: (Now) they are saying: Shall we really be restored to our first state

verses.content: أَإِذَا كُنَّا عِظَامًا نَّخِرَةً
verses.translation: Even after we are crumbled bones?

verses.content: قَالُوا تِلْكَ إِذًا كَرَّةٌ خَاسِرَةٌ
verses.translation: They say: Then that would be a vain proceeding.

verses.content: فَإِنَّمَا هِيَ زَجْرَةٌ وَاحِدَةٌ
verses.translation: Surely it will need but one shout,

verses.content: فَإِذَا هُم بِالسَّاهِرَةِ
verses.translation: And lo! they will be awakened.

verses.content: هَلْ أَتَاكَ حَدِيثُ مُوسَىٰ
verses.translation: Hath there come unto thee the history of Moses?

verses.content: إِذْ نَادَاهُ رَبُّهُ بِالْوَادِ الْمُقَدَّسِ طُوًى
verses.translation: How his Lord called him in the holy vale of Tuwa,

verses.content: اذْهَبْ إِلَىٰ فِرْعَوْنَ إِنَّهُ طَغَىٰ
verses.translation: (Saying:) Go thou unto Pharaoh - Lo! he hath rebelled -

verses.content: فَقُلْ هَل لَّكَ إِلَىٰ أَن تَزَكَّىٰ
verses.translation: And say (unto him): Hast thou (will) to grow (in grace)?

verses.content: وَأَهْدِيَكَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ فَتَخْشَىٰ
verses.translation: Then I will guide thee to thy Lord and thou shalt fear (Him).

verses.content: فَأَرَاهُ الْآيَةَ الْكُبْرَىٰ
verses.translation: And he showed him the tremendous token.

verses.content: فَكَذَّبَ وَعَصَىٰ
verses.translation: But he denied and disobeyed,

verses.content: ثُمَّ أَدْبَرَ يَسْعَىٰ
verses.translation: Then turned he away in haste,

verses.content: فَحَشَرَ فَنَادَىٰ
verses.translation: Then gathered he and summoned

verses.content: فَقَالَ أَنَا رَبُّكُمُ الْأَعْلَىٰ
verses.translation: And proclaimed: "I (Pharaoh) am your Lord the Highest."

verses.content: فَأَخَذَهُ اللَّهُ نَكَالَ الْآخِرَةِ وَالْأُولَىٰ
verses.translation: So Allah seized him (and made him) an example for the after (life) and for the former.

verses.content: إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَعِبْرَةً لِّمَن يَخْشَىٰ
verses.translation: Lo! herein is indeed a lesson for him who feareth.

verses.content: أَأَنتُمْ أَشَدُّ خَلْقًا أَمِ السَّمَاءُ ۚ بَنَاهَا
verses.translation: Are ye the harder to create, or is the heaven that He built?

verses.content: رَفَعَ سَمْكَهَا فَسَوَّاهَا
verses.translation: He raised the height thereof and ordered it;

verses.content: وَأَغْطَشَ لَيْلَهَا وَأَخْرَجَ ضُحَاهَا
verses.translation: And He made dark the night thereof, and He brought forth the morn thereof.

verses.content: وَالْأَرْضَ بَعْدَ ذَٰلِكَ دَحَاهَا
verses.translation: And after that He spread the earth,

verses.content: أَخْرَجَ مِنْهَا مَاءَهَا وَمَرْعَاهَا
verses.translation: And produced therefrom the water thereof and the pasture thereof,

verses.content: وَالْجِبَالَ أَرْسَاهَا
verses.translation: And He made fast the hills,

verses.content: مَتَاعًا لَّكُمْ وَلِأَنْعَامِكُمْ
verses.translation: A provision for you and for your cattle.

verses.content: فَإِذَا جَاءَتِ الطَّامَّةُ الْكُبْرَىٰ
verses.translation: But when the great disaster cometh,

verses.content: يَوْمَ يَتَذَكَّرُ الْإِنسَانُ مَا سَعَىٰ
verses.translation: The day when man will call to mind his (whole) endeavour,

verses.content: وَبُرِّزَتِ الْجَحِيمُ لِمَن يَرَىٰ
verses.translation: And hell will stand forth visible to him who seeth,

verses.content: فَأَمَّا مَن طَغَىٰ
verses.translation: Then, as for him who rebelled

verses.content: وَآثَرَ الْحَيَاةَ الدُّنْيَا
verses.translation: And chose the life of the world,

verses.content: فَإِنَّ الْجَحِيمَ هِيَ الْمَأْوَىٰ
verses.translation: Lo! hell will be his home.

verses.content: وَأَمَّا مَنْ خَافَ مَقَامَ رَبِّهِ وَنَهَى النَّفْسَ عَنِ الْهَوَىٰ
verses.translation: But as for him who feared to stand before his Lord and restrained his soul from lust,

verses.content: فَإِنَّ الْجَنَّةَ هِيَ الْمَأْوَىٰ
verses.translation: Lo! the Garden will be his home.

verses.content: يَسْأَلُونَكَ عَنِ السَّاعَةِ أَيَّانَ مُرْسَاهَا
verses.translation: They ask thee of the Hour: when will it come to port?

verses.content: فِيمَ أَنتَ مِن ذِكْرَاهَا
verses.translation: Why (ask they)? What hast thou to tell thereof?

verses.content: إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ مُنتَهَاهَا
verses.translation: Unto thy Lord belongeth (knowledge of) the term thereof.

verses.content: إِنَّمَا أَنتَ مُنذِرُ مَن يَخْشَاهَا
verses.translation: Thou art but a warner unto him who feareth it.

verses.content: كَأَنَّهُمْ يَوْمَ يَرَوْنَهَا لَمْ يَلْبَثُوا إِلَّا عَشِيَّةً أَوْ ضُحَاهَا
verses.translation: On the day when they behold it, it will be as if they had but tarried for an evening or the morn thereof.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ عَبَسَ وَتَوَلَّىٰ
verses.translation: He frowned and turned away

verses.content: أَن جَاءَهُ الْأَعْمَىٰ
verses.translation: Because the blind man came unto him.

verses.content: وَمَا يُدْرِيكَ لَعَلَّهُ يَزَّكَّىٰ
verses.translation: What could inform thee but that he might grow (in grace)

verses.content: أَوْ يَذَّكَّرُ فَتَنفَعَهُ الذِّكْرَىٰ
verses.translation: Or take heed and so the reminder might avail him?

verses.content: أَمَّا مَنِ اسْتَغْنَىٰ
verses.translation: As for him who thinketh himself independent,

verses.content: فَأَنتَ لَهُ تَصَدَّىٰ
verses.translation: Unto him thou payest regard.

verses.content: وَمَا عَلَيْكَ أَلَّا يَزَّكَّىٰ
verses.translation: Yet it is not thy concern if he grow not (in grace).

verses.content: وَأَمَّا مَن جَاءَكَ يَسْعَىٰ
verses.translation: But as for him who cometh unto thee with earnest purpose

verses.content: وَهُوَ يَخْشَىٰ
verses.translation: And hath fear,

verses.content: فَأَنتَ عَنْهُ تَلَهَّىٰ
verses.translation: From him thou art distracted.

verses.content: كَلَّا إِنَّهَا تَذْكِرَةٌ
verses.translation: Nay, but verily it is an Admonishment,

verses.content: فَمَن شَاءَ ذَكَرَهُ
verses.translation: So let whosoever will pay heed to it,

verses.content: فِي صُحُفٍ مُّكَرَّمَةٍ
verses.translation: On honoured leaves

verses.content: مَّرْفُوعَةٍ مُّطَهَّرَةٍ
verses.translation: Exalted, purified,

verses.content: بِأَيْدِي سَفَرَةٍ
verses.translation: (Set down) by scribes

verses.content: كِرَامٍ بَرَرَةٍ
verses.translation: Noble and righteous.

verses.content: قُتِلَ الْإِنسَانُ مَا أَكْفَرَهُ
verses.translation: Man is (self-)destroyed: how ungrateful!

verses.content: مِنْ أَيِّ شَيْءٍ خَلَقَهُ
verses.translation: From what thing doth He create him?

verses.content: مِن نُّطْفَةٍ خَلَقَهُ فَقَدَّرَهُ
verses.translation: From a drop of seed. He createth him and proportioneth him,

verses.content: ثُمَّ السَّبِيلَ يَسَّرَهُ
verses.translation: Then maketh the way easy for him,

verses.content: ثُمَّ أَمَاتَهُ فَأَقْبَرَهُ
verses.translation: Then causeth him to die, and burieth him;

verses.content: ثُمَّ إِذَا شَاءَ أَنشَرَهُ
verses.translation: Then, when He will, He bringeth him again to life.

verses.content: كَلَّا لَمَّا يَقْضِ مَا أَمَرَهُ
verses.translation: Nay, but (man) hath not done what He commanded him.

verses.content: فَلْيَنظُرِ الْإِنسَانُ إِلَىٰ طَعَامِهِ
verses.translation: Let man consider his food:

verses.content: أَنَّا صَبَبْنَا الْمَاءَ صَبًّا
verses.translation: How We pour water in showers

verses.content: ثُمَّ شَقَقْنَا الْأَرْضَ شَقًّا
verses.translation: Then split the earth in clefts

verses.content: فَأَنبَتْنَا فِيهَا حَبًّا
verses.translation: And cause the grain to grow therein

verses.content: وَعِنَبًا وَقَضْبًا
verses.translation: And grapes and green fodder

verses.content: وَزَيْتُونًا وَنَخْلًا
verses.translation: And olive-trees and palm-trees

verses.content: وَحَدَائِقَ غُلْبًا
verses.translation: And garden-closes of thick foliage

verses.content: وَفَاكِهَةً وَأَبًّا
verses.translation: And fruits and grasses:

verses.content: مَّتَاعًا لَّكُمْ وَلِأَنْعَامِكُمْ
verses.translation: Provision for you and your cattle.

verses.content: فَإِذَا جَاءَتِ الصَّاخَّةُ
verses.translation: But when the Shout cometh

verses.content: يَوْمَ يَفِرُّ الْمَرْءُ مِنْ أَخِيهِ
verses.translation: On the day when a man fleeth from his brother

verses.content: وَأُمِّهِ وَأَبِيهِ
verses.translation: And his mother and his father

verses.content: وَصَاحِبَتِهِ وَبَنِيهِ
verses.translation: And his wife and his children,

verses.content: لِكُلِّ امْرِئٍ مِّنْهُمْ يَوْمَئِذٍ شَأْنٌ يُغْنِيهِ
verses.translation: Every man that day will have concern enough to make him heedless (of others).

verses.content: وُجُوهٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ مُّسْفِرَةٌ
verses.translation: On that day faces will be bright as dawn,

verses.content: ضَاحِكَةٌ مُّسْتَبْشِرَةٌ
verses.translation: Laughing, rejoicing at good news;

verses.content: وَوُجُوهٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ عَلَيْهَا غَبَرَةٌ
verses.translation: And other faces, on that day, with dust upon them,

verses.content: تَرْهَقُهَا قَتَرَةٌ
verses.translation: Veiled in darkness,

verses.content: أُولَـٰئِكَ هُمُ الْكَفَرَةُ الْفَجَرَةُ
verses.translation: Those are the disbelievers, the wicked.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ إِذَا الشَّمْسُ كُوِّرَتْ
verses.translation: When the sun is overthrown,

verses.content: وَإِذَا النُّجُومُ انكَدَرَتْ
verses.translation: And when the stars fall,

verses.content: وَإِذَا الْجِبَالُ سُيِّرَتْ
verses.translation: And when the hills are moved,

verses.content: وَإِذَا الْعِشَارُ عُطِّلَتْ
verses.translation: And when the camels big with young are abandoned,

verses.content: وَإِذَا الْوُحُوشُ حُشِرَتْ
verses.translation: And when the wild beasts are herded together,

verses.content: وَإِذَا الْبِحَارُ سُجِّرَتْ
verses.translation: And when the seas rise,

verses.content: وَإِذَا النُّفُوسُ زُوِّجَتْ
verses.translation: And when souls are reunited,

verses.content: وَإِذَا الْمَوْءُودَةُ سُئِلَتْ
verses.translation: And when the girl-child that was buried alive is asked

verses.content: بِأَيِّ ذَنبٍ قُتِلَتْ
verses.translation: For what sin she was slain,

verses.content: وَإِذَا الصُّحُفُ نُشِرَتْ
verses.translation: And when the pages are laid open,

verses.content: وَإِذَا السَّمَاءُ كُشِطَتْ
verses.translation: And when the sky is torn away,

verses.content: وَإِذَا الْجَحِيمُ سُعِّرَتْ
verses.translation: And when hell is lighted,

verses.content: وَإِذَا الْجَنَّةُ أُزْلِفَتْ
verses.translation: And when the Garden is brought nigh,

verses.content: عَلِمَتْ نَفْسٌ مَّا أَحْضَرَتْ
verses.translation: (Then) every soul will know what it hath made ready.

verses.content: فَلَا أُقْسِمُ بِالْخُنَّسِ
verses.translation: Oh, but I call to witness the planets,

verses.content: الْجَوَارِ الْكُنَّسِ
verses.translation: The stars which rise and set,

verses.content: وَاللَّيْلِ إِذَا عَسْعَسَ
verses.translation: And the close of night,

verses.content: وَالصُّبْحِ إِذَا تَنَفَّسَ
verses.translation: And the breath of morning

verses.content: إِنَّهُ لَقَوْلُ رَسُولٍ كَرِيمٍ
verses.translation: That this is in truth the word of an honoured messenger,

verses.content: ذِي قُوَّةٍ عِندَ ذِي الْعَرْشِ مَكِينٍ
verses.translation: Mighty, established in the presence of the Lord of the Throne,

verses.content: مُّطَاعٍ ثَمَّ أَمِينٍ
verses.translation: (One) to be obeyed, and trustworthy;

verses.content: وَمَا صَاحِبُكُم بِمَجْنُونٍ
verses.translation: And your comrade is not mad.

verses.content: وَلَقَدْ رَآهُ بِالْأُفُقِ الْمُبِينِ
verses.translation: Surely he beheld Him on the clear horizon.

verses.content: وَمَا هُوَ عَلَى الْغَيْبِ بِضَنِينٍ
verses.translation: And he is not avid of the Unseen.

verses.content: وَمَا هُوَ بِقَوْلِ شَيْطَانٍ رَّجِيمٍ
verses.translation: Nor is this the utterance of a devil worthy to be stoned.

verses.content: فَأَيْنَ تَذْهَبُونَ
verses.translation: Whither then go ye?

verses.content: إِنْ هُوَ إِلَّا ذِكْرٌ لِّلْعَالَمِينَ
verses.translation: This is naught else than a reminder unto creation,

verses.content: لِمَن شَاءَ مِنكُمْ أَن يَسْتَقِيمَ
verses.translation: Unto whomsoever of you willeth to walk straight.

verses.content: وَمَا تَشَاءُونَ إِلَّا أَن يَشَاءَ اللَّهُ رَبُّ الْعَالَمِينَ
verses.translation: And ye will not, unless (it be) that Allah willeth, the Lord of Creation.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ إِذَا السَّمَاءُ انفَطَرَتْ
verses.translation: When the heaven is cleft asunder,

verses.content: وَإِذَا الْكَوَاكِبُ انتَثَرَتْ
verses.translation: When the planets are dispersed,

verses.content: وَإِذَا الْبِحَارُ فُجِّرَتْ
verses.translation: When the seas are poured forth,

verses.content: وَإِذَا الْقُبُورُ بُعْثِرَتْ
verses.translation: And the sepulchres are overturned,

verses.content: عَلِمَتْ نَفْسٌ مَّا قَدَّمَتْ وَأَخَّرَتْ
verses.translation: A soul will know what it hath sent before (it) and what left behind.

verses.content: يَا أَيُّهَا الْإِنسَانُ مَا غَرَّكَ بِرَبِّكَ الْكَرِيمِ
verses.translation: O man! What hath made thee careless concerning thy Lord, the Bountiful,

verses.content: الَّذِي خَلَقَكَ فَسَوَّاكَ فَعَدَلَكَ
verses.translation: Who created thee, then fashioned, then proportioned thee?

verses.content: فِي أَيِّ صُورَةٍ مَّا شَاءَ رَكَّبَكَ
verses.translation: Into whatsoever form He will, He casteth thee.

verses.content: كَلَّا بَلْ تُكَذِّبُونَ بِالدِّينِ
verses.translation: Nay, but ye deny the Judgment.

verses.content: وَإِنَّ عَلَيْكُمْ لَحَافِظِينَ
verses.translation: Lo! there are above you guardians,

verses.content: كِرَامًا كَاتِبِينَ
verses.translation: Generous and recording,

verses.content: يَعْلَمُونَ مَا تَفْعَلُونَ
verses.translation: Who know (all) that ye do.

verses.content: إِنَّ الْأَبْرَارَ لَفِي نَعِيمٍ
verses.translation: Lo! the righteous verily will be in delight.

verses.content: وَإِنَّ الْفُجَّارَ لَفِي جَحِيمٍ
verses.translation: And lo! the wicked verily will be in hell;

verses.content: يَصْلَوْنَهَا يَوْمَ الدِّينِ
verses.translation: They will burn therein on the Day of Judgment,

verses.content: وَمَا هُمْ عَنْهَا بِغَائِبِينَ
verses.translation: And will not be absent thence.

verses.content: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا يَوْمُ الدِّينِ
verses.translation: Ah, what will convey unto thee what the Day of Judgment is!

verses.content: ثُمَّ مَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا يَوْمُ الدِّينِ
verses.translation: Again, what will convey unto thee what the Day of Judgment is!

verses.content: يَوْمَ لَا تَمْلِكُ نَفْسٌ لِّنَفْسٍ شَيْئًا ۖ وَالْأَمْرُ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلَّهِ
verses.translation: A day on which no soul hath power at all for any (other) soul. The (absolute) command on that day is Allah's.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَيْلٌ لِّلْمُطَفِّفِينَ
verses.translation: Woe unto the defrauders:

verses.content: الَّذِينَ إِذَا اكْتَالُوا عَلَى النَّاسِ يَسْتَوْفُونَ
verses.translation: Those who when they take the measure from mankind demand it full,

verses.content: وَإِذَا كَالُوهُمْ أَو وَّزَنُوهُمْ يُخْسِرُونَ
verses.translation: But if they measure unto them or weight for them, they cause them loss.

verses.content: أَلَا يَظُنُّ أُولَـٰئِكَ أَنَّهُم مَّبْعُوثُونَ
verses.translation: Do such (men) not consider that they will be raised again

verses.content: لِيَوْمٍ عَظِيمٍ
verses.translation: Unto an Awful Day,

verses.content: يَوْمَ يَقُومُ النَّاسُ لِرَبِّ الْعَالَمِينَ
verses.translation: The day when (all) mankind stand before the Lord of the Worlds?

verses.content: كَلَّا إِنَّ كِتَابَ الْفُجَّارِ لَفِي سِجِّينٍ
verses.translation: Nay, but the record of the vile is in Sijjin -

verses.content: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا سِجِّينٌ
verses.translation: Ah! what will convey unto thee what Sijjin is! -

verses.content: كِتَابٌ مَّرْقُومٌ
verses.translation: A written record.

verses.content: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.translation: Woe unto the repudiators on that day!

verses.content: الَّذِينَ يُكَذِّبُونَ بِيَوْمِ الدِّينِ
verses.translation: Those who deny the Day of Judgment

verses.content: وَمَا يُكَذِّبُ بِهِ إِلَّا كُلُّ مُعْتَدٍ أَثِيمٍ
verses.translation: Which none denieth save each criminal transgressor,

verses.content: إِذَا تُتْلَىٰ عَلَيْهِ آيَاتُنَا قَالَ أَسَاطِيرُ الْأَوَّلِينَ
verses.translation: Who, when thou readest unto him Our revelations, saith: (Mere) fables of the men of old.

verses.content: كَلَّا ۖ بَلْ ۜ رَانَ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِهِم مَّا كَانُوا يَكْسِبُونَ
verses.translation: Nay, but that which they have earned is rust upon their hearts.

verses.content: كَلَّا إِنَّهُمْ عَن رَّبِّهِمْ يَوْمَئِذٍ لَّمَحْجُوبُونَ
verses.translation: Nay, but surely on that day they will be covered from (the mercy of) their Lord.

verses.content: ثُمَّ إِنَّهُمْ لَصَالُو الْجَحِيمِ
verses.translation: Then lo! they verily will burn in hell,

verses.content: ثُمَّ يُقَالُ هَـٰذَا الَّذِي كُنتُم بِهِ تُكَذِّبُونَ
verses.translation: And it will be said (unto them): This is that which ye used to deny.

verses.content: كَلَّا إِنَّ كِتَابَ الْأَبْرَارِ لَفِي عِلِّيِّينَ
verses.translation: Nay, but the record of the righteous is in 'Illiyin -

verses.content: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا عِلِّيُّونَ
verses.translation: Ah, what will convey unto thee what 'Illiyin is! -

verses.content: كِتَابٌ مَّرْقُومٌ
verses.translation: A written record,

verses.content: يَشْهَدُهُ الْمُقَرَّبُونَ
verses.translation: Attested by those who are brought near (unto their Lord).

verses.content: إِنَّ الْأَبْرَارَ لَفِي نَعِيمٍ
verses.translation: Lo! the righteous verily are in delight,

verses.content: عَلَى الْأَرَائِكِ يَنظُرُونَ
verses.translation: On couches, gazing,

verses.content: تَعْرِفُ فِي وُجُوهِهِمْ نَضْرَةَ النَّعِيمِ
verses.translation: Thou wilt know in their faces the radiance of delight.

verses.content: يُسْقَوْنَ مِن رَّحِيقٍ مَّخْتُومٍ
verses.translation: They are given to drink of a pure wine, sealed,

verses.content: خِتَامُهُ مِسْكٌ ۚ وَفِي ذَٰلِكَ فَلْيَتَنَافَسِ الْمُتَنَافِسُونَ
verses.translation: Whose seal is musk - for this let (all) those strive who strive for bliss -

verses.content: وَمِزَاجُهُ مِن تَسْنِيمٍ
verses.translation: And mixed with water of Tasnim,

verses.content: عَيْنًا يَشْرَبُ بِهَا الْمُقَرَّبُونَ
verses.translation: A spring whence those brought near (to Allah) drink.

verses.content: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ أَجْرَمُوا كَانُوا مِنَ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا يَضْحَكُونَ
verses.translation: Lo! the guilty used to laugh at those who believed,

verses.content: وَإِذَا مَرُّوا بِهِمْ يَتَغَامَزُونَ
verses.translation: And wink one to another when they passed them;

verses.content: وَإِذَا انقَلَبُوا إِلَىٰ أَهْلِهِمُ انقَلَبُوا فَكِهِينَ
verses.translation: And when they returned to their own folk, they returned jesting;

verses.content: وَإِذَا رَأَوْهُمْ قَالُوا إِنَّ هَـٰؤُلَاءِ لَضَالُّونَ
verses.translation: And when they saw them they said: Lo! these have gone astray.

verses.content: وَمَا أُرْسِلُوا عَلَيْهِمْ حَافِظِينَ
verses.translation: Yet they were not sent as guardians over them.

verses.content: فَالْيَوْمَ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا مِنَ الْكُفَّارِ يَضْحَكُونَ
verses.translation: This day it is those who believe who have the laugh of disbelievers,

verses.content: عَلَى الْأَرَائِكِ يَنظُرُونَ
verses.translation: On high couches, gazing.

verses.content: هَلْ ثُوِّبَ الْكُفَّارُ مَا كَانُوا يَفْعَلُونَ
verses.translation: Are not the disbelievers paid for what they used to do?

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ إِذَا السَّمَاءُ انشَقَّتْ
verses.translation: When the heaven is split asunder

verses.content: وَأَذِنَتْ لِرَبِّهَا وَحُقَّتْ
verses.translation: And attentive to her Lord in fear,

verses.content: وَإِذَا الْأَرْضُ مُدَّتْ
verses.translation: And when the earth is spread out

verses.content: وَأَلْقَتْ مَا فِيهَا وَتَخَلَّتْ
verses.translation: And hath cast out all that was in her, and is empty

verses.content: وَأَذِنَتْ لِرَبِّهَا وَحُقَّتْ
verses.translation: And attentive to her Lord in fear!

verses.content: يَا أَيُّهَا الْإِنسَانُ إِنَّكَ كَادِحٌ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ كَدْحًا فَمُلَاقِيهِ
verses.translation: Thou, verily, O man, art working toward thy Lord a work which thou wilt meet (in His presence).

verses.content: فَأَمَّا مَنْ أُوتِيَ كِتَابَهُ بِيَمِينِهِ
verses.translation: Then whoso is given his account in his right hand

verses.content: فَسَوْفَ يُحَاسَبُ حِسَابًا يَسِيرًا
verses.translation: He truly will receive an easy reckoning

verses.content: وَيَنقَلِبُ إِلَىٰ أَهْلِهِ مَسْرُورًا
verses.translation: And will return unto his folk in joy.

verses.content: وَأَمَّا مَنْ أُوتِيَ كِتَابَهُ وَرَاءَ ظَهْرِهِ
verses.translation: But whoso is given his account behind his back,

verses.content: فَسَوْفَ يَدْعُو ثُبُورًا
verses.translation: He surely will invoke destruction

verses.content: وَيَصْلَىٰ سَعِيرًا
verses.translation: And be thrown to scorching fire.

verses.content: إِنَّهُ كَانَ فِي أَهْلِهِ مَسْرُورًا
verses.translation: He verily lived joyous with his folk,

verses.content: إِنَّهُ ظَنَّ أَن لَّن يَحُورَ
verses.translation: He verily deemed that he would never return (unto Allah).

verses.content: بَلَىٰ إِنَّ رَبَّهُ كَانَ بِهِ بَصِيرًا
verses.translation: Nay, but lo! his Lord is ever looking on him!

verses.content: فَلَا أُقْسِمُ بِالشَّفَقِ
verses.translation: Oh, I swear by the afterglow of sunset,

verses.content: وَاللَّيْلِ وَمَا وَسَقَ
verses.translation: And by the night and all that it enshroudeth,

verses.content: وَالْقَمَرِ إِذَا اتَّسَقَ
verses.translation: And by the moon when she is at the full,

verses.content: لَتَرْكَبُنَّ طَبَقًا عَن طَبَقٍ
verses.translation: That ye shall journey on from plane to plane.

verses.content: فَمَا لَهُمْ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ
verses.translation: What aileth them, then, that they believe not

verses.content: وَإِذَا قُرِئَ عَلَيْهِمُ الْقُرْآنُ لَا يَسْجُدُونَ ۩
verses.translation: And, when the Qur'an is recited unto them, worship not (Allah)?

verses.content: بَلِ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا يُكَذِّبُونَ
verses.translation: Nay, but those who disbelieve will deny;

verses.content: وَاللَّهُ أَعْلَمُ بِمَا يُوعُونَ
verses.translation: And Allah knoweth best what they are hiding.

verses.content: فَبَشِّرْهُم بِعَذَابٍ أَلِيمٍ
verses.translation: So give them tidings of a painful doom,

verses.content: إِلَّا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ لَهُمْ أَجْرٌ غَيْرُ مَمْنُونٍ
verses.translation: Save those who believe and do good works, for theirs is a reward unfailing.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَالسَّمَاءِ ذَاتِ الْبُرُوجِ
verses.translation: By the heaven, holding mansions of the stars,

verses.content: وَالْيَوْمِ الْمَوْعُودِ
verses.translation: And by the Promised Day.

verses.content: وَشَاهِدٍ وَمَشْهُودٍ
verses.translation: And by the witness and that whereunto he beareth testimony,

verses.content: قُتِلَ أَصْحَابُ الْأُخْدُودِ
verses.translation: (Self-)destroyed were the owners of the ditch

verses.content: النَّارِ ذَاتِ الْوَقُودِ
verses.translation: Of the fuel-fed fire,

verses.content: إِذْ هُمْ عَلَيْهَا قُعُودٌ
verses.translation: When they sat by it,

verses.content: وَهُمْ عَلَىٰ مَا يَفْعَلُونَ بِالْمُؤْمِنِينَ شُهُودٌ
verses.translation: And were themselves the witnesses of what they did to the believers.

verses.content: وَمَا نَقَمُوا مِنْهُمْ إِلَّا أَن يُؤْمِنُوا بِاللَّهِ الْعَزِيزِ الْحَمِيدِ
verses.translation: They had naught against them save that they believed in Allah, the Mighty, the Owner of Praise,

verses.content: الَّذِي لَهُ مُلْكُ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ ۚ وَاللَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيْءٍ شَهِيدٌ
verses.translation: Him unto Whom belongeth the Sovereignty of the heavens and the earth; and Allah is of all things the Witness.

verses.content: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ فَتَنُوا الْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَالْمُؤْمِنَاتِ ثُمَّ لَمْ يَتُوبُوا فَلَهُمْ عَذَابُ جَهَنَّمَ وَلَهُمْ عَذَابُ الْحَرِيقِ
verses.translation: Lo! they who persecute believing men and believing women and repent not, theirs verily will be the doom of hell, and theirs the doom of burning.

verses.content: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ لَهُمْ جَنَّاتٌ تَجْرِي مِن تَحْتِهَا الْأَنْهَارُ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ الْفَوْزُ الْكَبِيرُ
verses.translation: Lo! those who believe and do good works, theirs will be Gardens underneath which rivers flow. That is the Great Success.

verses.content: إِنَّ بَطْشَ رَبِّكَ لَشَدِيدٌ
verses.translation: Lo! the punishment of thy Lord is stern.

verses.content: إِنَّهُ هُوَ يُبْدِئُ وَيُعِيدُ
verses.translation: Lo! He it is Who produceth, then reproduceth,

verses.content: وَهُوَ الْغَفُورُ الْوَدُودُ
verses.translation: And He is the Forgiving, the Loving,

verses.content: ذُو الْعَرْشِ الْمَجِيدُ
verses.translation: Lord of the Throne of Glory,

verses.content: فَعَّالٌ لِّمَا يُرِيدُ
verses.translation: Doer of what He will.

verses.content: هَلْ أَتَاكَ حَدِيثُ الْجُنُودِ
verses.translation: Hath there come unto thee the story of the hosts

verses.content: فِرْعَوْنَ وَثَمُودَ
verses.translation: Of Pharaoh and (the tribe of) Thamud?

verses.content: بَلِ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا فِي تَكْذِيبٍ
verses.translation: Nay, but those who disbelieve live in denial

verses.content: وَاللَّهُ مِن وَرَائِهِم مُّحِيطٌ
verses.translation: And Allah, all unseen, surroundeth them.

verses.content: بَلْ هُوَ قُرْآنٌ مَّجِيدٌ
verses.translation: Nay, but it is a glorious Qur'an.

verses.content: فِي لَوْحٍ مَّحْفُوظٍ
verses.translation: On a guarded tablet.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَالسَّمَاءِ وَالطَّارِقِ
verses.translation: By the heaven and the Morning Star

verses.content: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا الطَّارِقُ
verses.translation: - Ah, what will tell thee what the Morning Star is!

verses.content: النَّجْمُ الثَّاقِبُ
verses.translation: - The piercing Star!

verses.content: إِن كُلُّ نَفْسٍ لَّمَّا عَلَيْهَا حَافِظٌ
verses.translation: No human soul but hath a guardian over it.

verses.content: فَلْيَنظُرِ الْإِنسَانُ مِمَّ خُلِقَ
verses.translation: So let man consider from what he is created.

verses.content: خُلِقَ مِن مَّاءٍ دَافِقٍ
verses.translation: He is created from a gushing fluid

verses.content: يَخْرُجُ مِن بَيْنِ الصُّلْبِ وَالتَّرَائِبِ
verses.translation: That issued from between the loins and ribs.

verses.content: إِنَّهُ عَلَىٰ رَجْعِهِ لَقَادِرٌ
verses.translation: Lo! He verily is Able to return him (unto life)

verses.content: يَوْمَ تُبْلَى السَّرَائِرُ
verses.translation: On the day when hidden thoughts shall be searched out.

verses.content: فَمَا لَهُ مِن قُوَّةٍ وَلَا نَاصِرٍ
verses.translation: Then will he have no might nor any helper.

verses.content: وَالسَّمَاءِ ذَاتِ الرَّجْعِ
verses.translation: By the heaven which giveth the returning rain,

verses.content: وَالْأَرْضِ ذَاتِ الصَّدْعِ
verses.translation: And the earth which splitteth (with the growth of trees and plants)

verses.content: إِنَّهُ لَقَوْلٌ فَصْلٌ
verses.translation: Lo! this (Qur'an) is a conclusive word,

verses.content: وَمَا هُوَ بِالْهَزْلِ
verses.translation: It is no pleasantry.

verses.content: إِنَّهُمْ يَكِيدُونَ كَيْدًا
verses.translation: Lo! they plot a plot (against thee, O Muhammad)

verses.content: وَأَكِيدُ كَيْدًا
verses.translation: And I plot a plot (against them).

verses.content: فَمَهِّلِ الْكَافِرِينَ أَمْهِلْهُمْ رُوَيْدًا
verses.translation: So give a respite to the disbelievers. Deal thou gently with them for a while.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ سَبِّحِ اسْمَ رَبِّكَ الْأَعْلَى
verses.translation: Praise the name of thy Lord the Most High,

verses.content: الَّذِي خَلَقَ فَسَوَّىٰ
verses.translation: Who createth, then disposeth;

verses.content: وَالَّذِي قَدَّرَ فَهَدَىٰ
verses.translation: Who measureth, then guideth;

verses.content: وَالَّذِي أَخْرَجَ الْمَرْعَىٰ
verses.translation: Who bringeth forth the pasturage,

verses.content: فَجَعَلَهُ غُثَاءً أَحْوَىٰ
verses.translation: Then turneth it to russet stubble.

verses.content: سَنُقْرِئُكَ فَلَا تَنسَىٰ
verses.translation: We shall make thee read (O Muhammad) so that thou shalt not forget

verses.content: إِلَّا مَا شَاءَ اللَّهُ ۚ إِنَّهُ يَعْلَمُ الْجَهْرَ وَمَا يَخْفَىٰ
verses.translation: Save that which Allah willeth. Lo! He knoweth the disclosed and that which still is hidden;

verses.content: وَنُيَسِّرُكَ لِلْيُسْرَىٰ
verses.translation: And We shall ease thy way unto the state of ease.

verses.content: فَذَكِّرْ إِن نَّفَعَتِ الذِّكْرَىٰ
verses.translation: Therefor remind (men), for of use is the reminder.

verses.content: سَيَذَّكَّرُ مَن يَخْشَىٰ
verses.translation: He will heed who feareth,

verses.content: وَيَتَجَنَّبُهَا الْأَشْقَى
verses.translation: But the most hapless will flout it,

verses.content: الَّذِي يَصْلَى النَّارَ الْكُبْرَىٰ
verses.translation: He who will be flung to the great Fire

verses.content: ثُمَّ لَا يَمُوتُ فِيهَا وَلَا يَحْيَىٰ
verses.translation: Wherein he will neither die nor live.

verses.content: قَدْ أَفْلَحَ مَن تَزَكَّىٰ
verses.translation: He is successful who groweth,

verses.content: وَذَكَرَ اسْمَ رَبِّهِ فَصَلَّىٰ
verses.translation: And remembereth the name of his Lord, so prayeth,

verses.content: بَلْ تُؤْثِرُونَ الْحَيَاةَ الدُّنْيَا
verses.translation: But ye prefer the life of the world

verses.content: وَالْآخِرَةُ خَيْرٌ وَأَبْقَىٰ
verses.translation: Although the Hereafter is better and more lasting.

verses.content: إِنَّ هَـٰذَا لَفِي الصُّحُفِ الْأُولَىٰ
verses.translation: Lo! This is in the former scrolls.

verses.content: صُحُفِ إِبْرَاهِيمَ وَمُوسَىٰ
verses.translation: The Books of Abraham and Moses.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ هَلْ أَتَاكَ حَدِيثُ الْغَاشِيَةِ
verses.translation: Hath there come unto thee tidings of the Overwhelming?

verses.content: وُجُوهٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ خَاشِعَةٌ
verses.translation: On that day (many) faces will be downcast,

verses.content: عَامِلَةٌ نَّاصِبَةٌ
verses.translation: Toiling, weary,

verses.content: تَصْلَىٰ نَارًا حَامِيَةً
verses.translation: Scorched by burning fire,

verses.content: تُسْقَىٰ مِنْ عَيْنٍ آنِيَةٍ
verses.translation: Drinking from a boiling spring,

verses.content: لَّيْسَ لَهُمْ طَعَامٌ إِلَّا مِن ضَرِيعٍ
verses.translation: No food for them save bitter thorn-fruit

verses.content: لَّا يُسْمِنُ وَلَا يُغْنِي مِن جُوعٍ
verses.translation: Which doth not nourish nor release from hunger.

verses.content: وُجُوهٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ نَّاعِمَةٌ
verses.translation: In that day other faces will be calm,

verses.content: لِّسَعْيِهَا رَاضِيَةٌ
verses.translation: Glad for their effort past,

verses.content: فِي جَنَّةٍ عَالِيَةٍ
verses.translation: In a high Garden

verses.content: لَّا تَسْمَعُ فِيهَا لَاغِيَةً
verses.translation: Where they hear no idle speech,

verses.content: فِيهَا عَيْنٌ جَارِيَةٌ
verses.translation: Wherein is a gushing spring,

verses.content: فِيهَا سُرُرٌ مَّرْفُوعَةٌ
verses.translation: Wherein are couches raised

verses.content: وَأَكْوَابٌ مَّوْضُوعَةٌ
verses.translation: And goblets set at hand

verses.content: وَنَمَارِقُ مَصْفُوفَةٌ
verses.translation: And cushions ranged

verses.content: وَزَرَابِيُّ مَبْثُوثَةٌ
verses.translation: And silken carpets spread.

verses.content: أَفَلَا يَنظُرُونَ إِلَى الْإِبِلِ كَيْفَ خُلِقَتْ
verses.translation: Will they not regard the camels, how they are created?

verses.content: وَإِلَى السَّمَاءِ كَيْفَ رُفِعَتْ
verses.translation: And the heaven, how it is raised?

verses.content: وَإِلَى الْجِبَالِ كَيْفَ نُصِبَتْ
verses.translation: And the hills, how they are set up?

verses.content: وَإِلَى الْأَرْضِ كَيْفَ سُطِحَتْ
verses.translation: And the earth, how it is spread?

verses.content: فَذَكِّرْ إِنَّمَا أَنتَ مُذَكِّرٌ
verses.translation: Remind them, for thou art but a remembrancer,

verses.content: لَّسْتَ عَلَيْهِم بِمُصَيْطِرٍ
verses.translation: Thou art not at all a warder over them.

verses.content: إِلَّا مَن تَوَلَّىٰ وَكَفَرَ
verses.translation: But whoso is averse and disbelieveth,

verses.content: فَيُعَذِّبُهُ اللَّهُ الْعَذَابَ الْأَكْبَرَ
verses.translation: Allah will punish him with direst punishment.

verses.content: إِنَّ إِلَيْنَا إِيَابَهُمْ
verses.translation: Lo! unto Us is their return

verses.content: ثُمَّ إِنَّ عَلَيْنَا حِسَابَهُم
verses.translation: And Ours their reckoning.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَالْفَجْرِ
verses.translation: By the Dawn

verses.content: وَلَيَالٍ عَشْرٍ
verses.translation: And ten nights,

verses.content: وَالشَّفْعِ وَالْوَتْرِ
verses.translation: And the Even and the Odd,

verses.content: وَاللَّيْلِ إِذَا يَسْرِ
verses.translation: And the night when it departeth,

verses.content: هَلْ فِي ذَٰلِكَ قَسَمٌ لِّذِي حِجْرٍ
verses.translation: There surely is an oath for thinking man.

verses.content: أَلَمْ تَرَ كَيْفَ فَعَلَ رَبُّكَ بِعَادٍ
verses.translation: Dost thou not consider how thy Lord dealt with (the tribe of) A'ad,

verses.content: إِرَمَ ذَاتِ الْعِمَادِ
verses.translation: With many-columned Iram,

verses.content: الَّتِي لَمْ يُخْلَقْ مِثْلُهَا فِي الْبِلَادِ
verses.translation: The like of which was not created in the lands;

verses.content: وَثَمُودَ الَّذِينَ جَابُوا الصَّخْرَ بِالْوَادِ
verses.translation: And with (the tribe of) Thamud, who clove the rocks in the valley;

verses.content: وَفِرْعَوْنَ ذِي الْأَوْتَادِ
verses.translation: And with Pharaoh, firm of might,

verses.content: الَّذِينَ طَغَوْا فِي الْبِلَادِ
verses.translation: Who (all) were rebellious (to Allah) in these lands,

verses.content: فَأَكْثَرُوا فِيهَا الْفَسَادَ
verses.translation: And multiplied iniquity therein?

verses.content: فَصَبَّ عَلَيْهِمْ رَبُّكَ سَوْطَ عَذَابٍ
verses.translation: Therefore thy Lord poured on them the disaster of His punishment.

verses.content: إِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَبِالْمِرْصَادِ
verses.translation: Lo! thy Lord is ever watchful.

verses.content: فَأَمَّا الْإِنسَانُ إِذَا مَا ابْتَلَاهُ رَبُّهُ فَأَكْرَمَهُ وَنَعَّمَهُ فَيَقُولُ رَبِّي أَكْرَمَنِ
verses.translation: As for man, whenever his Lord trieth him by honouring him, and is gracious unto him, he saith: My Lord honoureth me.

verses.content: وَأَمَّا إِذَا مَا ابْتَلَاهُ فَقَدَرَ عَلَيْهِ رِزْقَهُ فَيَقُولُ رَبِّي أَهَانَنِ
verses.translation: But whenever He trieth him by straitening his means of life, he saith: My Lord despiseth me.

verses.content: كَلَّا ۖ بَل لَّا تُكْرِمُونَ الْيَتِيمَ
verses.translation: Nay, but ye (for your part) honour not the orphan

verses.content: وَلَا تَحَاضُّونَ عَلَىٰ طَعَامِ الْمِسْكِينِ
verses.translation: And urge not on the feeding of the poor.

verses.content: وَتَأْكُلُونَ التُّرَاثَ أَكْلًا لَّمًّا
verses.translation: And ye devour heritages with devouring greed.

verses.content: وَتُحِبُّونَ الْمَالَ حُبًّا جَمًّا
verses.translation: And love wealth with abounding love.

verses.content: كَلَّا إِذَا دُكَّتِ الْأَرْضُ دَكًّا دَكًّا
verses.translation: Nay, but when the earth is ground to atoms, grinding, grinding,

verses.content: وَجَاءَ رَبُّكَ وَالْمَلَكُ صَفًّا صَفًّا
verses.translation: And thy Lord shall come with angels, rank on rank,

verses.content: وَجِيءَ يَوْمَئِذٍ بِجَهَنَّمَ ۚ يَوْمَئِذٍ يَتَذَكَّرُ الْإِنسَانُ وَأَنَّىٰ لَهُ الذِّكْرَىٰ
verses.translation: And hell is brought near that day; on that day man will remember, but how will the remembrance (then avail him)?

verses.content: يَقُولُ يَا لَيْتَنِي قَدَّمْتُ لِحَيَاتِي
verses.translation: He will say: Ah, would that I had sent before me (some provision) for my life!

verses.content: فَيَوْمَئِذٍ لَّا يُعَذِّبُ عَذَابَهُ أَحَدٌ
verses.translation: None punisheth as He will punish on that day!

verses.content: وَلَا يُوثِقُ وَثَاقَهُ أَحَدٌ
verses.translation: None bindeth as He then will bind.

verses.content: يَا أَيَّتُهَا النَّفْسُ الْمُطْمَئِنَّةُ
verses.translation: But ah! thou soul at peace!

verses.content: ارْجِعِي إِلَىٰ رَبِّكِ رَاضِيَةً مَّرْضِيَّةً
verses.translation: Return unto thy Lord, content in His good pleasure!

verses.content: فَادْخُلِي فِي عِبَادِي
verses.translation: Enter thou among My bondmen!

verses.content: وَادْخُلِي جَنَّتِي
verses.translation: Enter thou My Garden!

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ لَا أُقْسِمُ بِهَـٰذَا الْبَلَدِ
verses.translation: Nay, I swear by this city -

verses.content: وَأَنتَ حِلٌّ بِهَـٰذَا الْبَلَدِ
verses.translation: And thou art an indweller of this city -

verses.content: وَوَالِدٍ وَمَا وَلَدَ
verses.translation: And the begetter and that which he begat,

verses.content: لَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا الْإِنسَانَ فِي كَبَدٍ
verses.translation: We verily have created man in an atmosphere:

verses.content: أَيَحْسَبُ أَن لَّن يَقْدِرَ عَلَيْهِ أَحَدٌ
verses.translation: Thinketh he that none hath power over him?

verses.content: يَقُولُ أَهْلَكْتُ مَالًا لُّبَدًا
verses.translation: And he saith: I have destroyed vast wealth:

verses.content: أَيَحْسَبُ أَن لَّمْ يَرَهُ أَحَدٌ
verses.translation: Thinketh he that none beholdeth him?

verses.content: أَلَمْ نَجْعَل لَّهُ عَيْنَيْنِ
verses.translation: Did We not assign unto him two eyes

verses.content: وَلِسَانًا وَشَفَتَيْنِ
verses.translation: And a tongue and two lips,

verses.content: وَهَدَيْنَاهُ النَّجْدَيْنِ
verses.translation: And guide him to the parting of the mountain ways?

verses.content: فَلَا اقْتَحَمَ الْعَقَبَةَ
verses.translation: But he hath not attempted the Ascent -

verses.content: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا الْعَقَبَةُ
verses.translation: Ah, what will convey unto thee what the Ascent is! -

verses.content: فَكُّ رَقَبَةٍ
verses.translation: (It is) to free a slave,

verses.content: أَوْ إِطْعَامٌ فِي يَوْمٍ ذِي مَسْغَبَةٍ
verses.translation: And to feed in the day of hunger.

verses.content: يَتِيمًا ذَا مَقْرَبَةٍ
verses.translation: An orphan near of kin,

verses.content: أَوْ مِسْكِينًا ذَا مَتْرَبَةٍ
verses.translation: Or some poor wretch in misery,

verses.content: ثُمَّ كَانَ مِنَ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَتَوَاصَوْا بِالصَّبْرِ وَتَوَاصَوْا بِالْمَرْحَمَةِ
verses.translation: And to be of those who believe and exhort one another to perseverance and exhort one another to pity.

verses.content: أُولَـٰئِكَ أَصْحَابُ الْمَيْمَنَةِ
verses.translation: Their place will be on the right hand.

verses.content: وَالَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا بِآيَاتِنَا هُمْ أَصْحَابُ الْمَشْأَمَةِ
verses.translation: But those who disbelieve Our revelations, their place will be on the left hand.

verses.content: عَلَيْهِمْ نَارٌ مُّؤْصَدَةٌ
verses.translation: Fire will be an awning over them.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَالشَّمْسِ وَضُحَاهَا
verses.translation: By the sun and his brightness,

verses.content: وَالْقَمَرِ إِذَا تَلَاهَا
verses.translation: And the moon when she followeth him,

verses.content: وَالنَّهَارِ إِذَا جَلَّاهَا
verses.translation: And the day when it revealeth him,

verses.content: وَاللَّيْلِ إِذَا يَغْشَاهَا
verses.translation: And the night when it enshroudeth him,

verses.content: وَالسَّمَاءِ وَمَا بَنَاهَا
verses.translation: And the heaven and Him Who built it,

verses.content: وَالْأَرْضِ وَمَا طَحَاهَا
verses.translation: And the earth and Him Who spread it,

verses.content: وَنَفْسٍ وَمَا سَوَّاهَا
verses.translation: And a soul and Him Who perfected it

verses.content: فَأَلْهَمَهَا فُجُورَهَا وَتَقْوَاهَا
verses.translation: And inspired it (with conscience of) what is wrong for it and (what is) right for it.

verses.content: قَدْ أَفْلَحَ مَن زَكَّاهَا
verses.translation: He is indeed successful who causeth it to grow,

verses.content: وَقَدْ خَابَ مَن دَسَّاهَا
verses.translation: And he is indeed a failure who stunteth it.

verses.content: كَذَّبَتْ ثَمُودُ بِطَغْوَاهَا
verses.translation: (The tribe of) Thamud denied (the truth) in their rebellious pride,

verses.content: إِذِ انبَعَثَ أَشْقَاهَا
verses.translation: When the basest of them broke forth

verses.content: فَقَالَ لَهُمْ رَسُولُ اللَّهِ نَاقَةَ اللَّهِ وَسُقْيَاهَا
verses.translation: And the messenger of Allah said: It is the she-camel of Allah, so let her drink!

verses.content: فَكَذَّبُوهُ فَعَقَرُوهَا فَدَمْدَمَ عَلَيْهِمْ رَبُّهُم بِذَنبِهِمْ فَسَوَّاهَا
verses.translation: But they denied him, and they hamstrung her, so Allah doomed them for their sin and rased (their dwellings).

verses.content: وَلَا يَخَافُ عُقْبَاهَا
verses.translation: He dreadeth not the sequel (of events).

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَاللَّيْلِ إِذَا يَغْشَىٰ
verses.translation: By the night enshrouding

verses.content: وَالنَّهَارِ إِذَا تَجَلَّىٰ
verses.translation: And the day resplendent

verses.content: وَمَا خَلَقَ الذَّكَرَ وَالْأُنثَىٰ
verses.translation: And Him Who hath created male and female,

verses.content: إِنَّ سَعْيَكُمْ لَشَتَّىٰ
verses.translation: Lo! your effort is dispersed (toward divers ends).

verses.content: فَأَمَّا مَنْ أَعْطَىٰ وَاتَّقَىٰ
verses.translation: As for him who giveth and is dutiful (toward Allah)

verses.content: وَصَدَّقَ بِالْحُسْنَىٰ
verses.translation: And believeth in goodness;

verses.content: فَسَنُيَسِّرُهُ لِلْيُسْرَىٰ
verses.translation: Surely We will ease his way unto the state of ease.

verses.content: وَأَمَّا مَن بَخِلَ وَاسْتَغْنَىٰ
verses.translation: But as for him who hoardeth and deemeth himself independent,

verses.content: وَكَذَّبَ بِالْحُسْنَىٰ
verses.translation: And disbelieveth in goodness;

verses.content: فَسَنُيَسِّرُهُ لِلْعُسْرَىٰ
verses.translation: Surely We will ease his way unto adversity.

verses.content: وَمَا يُغْنِي عَنْهُ مَالُهُ إِذَا تَرَدَّىٰ
verses.translation: His riches will not save him when he perisheth.

verses.content: إِنَّ عَلَيْنَا لَلْهُدَىٰ
verses.translation: Lo! Ours it is (to give) the guidance

verses.content: وَإِنَّ لَنَا لَلْآخِرَةَ وَالْأُولَىٰ
verses.translation: And lo! unto Us belong the latter portion and the former.

verses.content: فَأَنذَرْتُكُمْ نَارًا تَلَظَّىٰ
verses.translation: Therefor have I warned you of the flaming Fire

verses.content: لَا يَصْلَاهَا إِلَّا الْأَشْقَى
verses.translation: Which only the most wretched must endure,

verses.content: الَّذِي كَذَّبَ وَتَوَلَّىٰ
verses.translation: He who denieth and turneth away.

verses.content: وَسَيُجَنَّبُهَا الْأَتْقَى
verses.translation: Far removed from it will be the righteous

verses.content: الَّذِي يُؤْتِي مَالَهُ يَتَزَكَّىٰ
verses.translation: Who giveth his wealth that he may grow (in goodness).

verses.content: وَمَا لِأَحَدٍ عِندَهُ مِن نِّعْمَةٍ تُجْزَىٰ
verses.translation: And none hath with him any favour for reward,

verses.content: إِلَّا ابْتِغَاءَ وَجْهِ رَبِّهِ الْأَعْلَىٰ
verses.translation: Except as seeking (to fulfil) the purpose of his Lord Most High.

verses.content: وَلَسَوْفَ يَرْضَىٰ
verses.translation: He verily will be content.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَالضُّحَىٰ
verses.translation: By the morning hours

verses.content: وَاللَّيْلِ إِذَا سَجَىٰ
verses.translation: And by the night when it is stillest,

verses.content: مَا وَدَّعَكَ رَبُّكَ وَمَا قَلَىٰ
verses.translation: Thy Lord hath not forsaken thee nor doth He hate thee,

verses.content: وَلَلْآخِرَةُ خَيْرٌ لَّكَ مِنَ الْأُولَىٰ
verses.translation: And verily the latter portion will be better for thee than the former,

verses.content: وَلَسَوْفَ يُعْطِيكَ رَبُّكَ فَتَرْضَىٰ
verses.translation: And verily thy Lord will give unto thee so that thou wilt be content.

verses.content: أَلَمْ يَجِدْكَ يَتِيمًا فَآوَىٰ
verses.translation: Did He not find thee an orphan and protect (thee)?

verses.content: وَوَجَدَكَ ضَالًّا فَهَدَىٰ
verses.translation: Did He not find thee wandering and direct (thee)?

verses.content: وَوَجَدَكَ عَائِلًا فَأَغْنَىٰ
verses.translation: Did He not find thee destitute and enrich (thee)?

verses.content: فَأَمَّا الْيَتِيمَ فَلَا تَقْهَرْ
verses.translation: Therefor the orphan oppress not,

verses.content: وَأَمَّا السَّائِلَ فَلَا تَنْهَرْ
verses.translation: Therefor the beggar drive not away,

verses.content: وَأَمَّا بِنِعْمَةِ رَبِّكَ فَحَدِّثْ
verses.translation: Therefor of the bounty of thy Lord be thy discourse.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ أَلَمْ نَشْرَحْ لَكَ صَدْرَكَ
verses.translation: Have We not caused thy bosom to dilate,

verses.content: وَوَضَعْنَا عَنكَ وِزْرَكَ
verses.translation: And eased thee of the burden

verses.content: الَّذِي أَنقَضَ ظَهْرَكَ
verses.translation: Which weighed down thy back;

verses.content: وَرَفَعْنَا لَكَ ذِكْرَكَ
verses.translation: And exalted thy fame?

verses.content: فَإِنَّ مَعَ الْعُسْرِ يُسْرًا
verses.translation: But lo! with hardship goeth ease,

verses.content: إِنَّ مَعَ الْعُسْرِ يُسْرًا
verses.translation: Lo! with hardship goeth ease;

verses.content: فَإِذَا فَرَغْتَ فَانصَبْ
verses.translation: So when thou art relieved, still toil

verses.content: وَإِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ فَارْغَب
verses.translation: And strive to please thy Lord.

verses.content: بِّسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَالتِّينِ وَالزَّيْتُونِ
verses.translation: By the fig and the olive,

verses.content: وَطُورِ سِينِينَ
verses.translation: By Mount Sinai,

verses.content: وَهَـٰذَا الْبَلَدِ الْأَمِينِ
verses.translation: And by this land made safe;

verses.content: لَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا الْإِنسَانَ فِي أَحْسَنِ تَقْوِيمٍ
verses.translation: Surely We created man of the best stature

verses.content: ثُمَّ رَدَدْنَاهُ أَسْفَلَ سَافِلِينَ
verses.translation: Then we reduced him to the lowest of the low,

verses.content: إِلَّا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ فَلَهُمْ أَجْرٌ غَيْرُ مَمْنُونٍ
verses.translation: Save those who believe and do good works, and theirs is a reward unfailing.

verses.content: فَمَا يُكَذِّبُكَ بَعْدُ بِالدِّينِ
verses.translation: So who henceforth will give the lie to thee about the judgment?

verses.content: أَلَيْسَ اللَّهُ بِأَحْكَمِ الْحَاكِمِينَ
verses.translation: Is not Allah the most conclusive of all judges?

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ اقْرَأْ بِاسْمِ رَبِّكَ الَّذِي خَلَقَ
verses.translation: Read: In the name of thy Lord Who createth,

verses.content: خَلَقَ الْإِنسَانَ مِنْ عَلَقٍ
verses.translation: Createth man from a clot.

verses.content: اقْرَأْ وَرَبُّكَ الْأَكْرَمُ
verses.translation: Read: And thy Lord is the Most Bounteous,

verses.content: الَّذِي عَلَّمَ بِالْقَلَمِ
verses.translation: Who teacheth by the pen,

verses.content: عَلَّمَ الْإِنسَانَ مَا لَمْ يَعْلَمْ
verses.translation: Teacheth man that which he knew not.

verses.content: كَلَّا إِنَّ الْإِنسَانَ لَيَطْغَىٰ
verses.translation: Nay, but verily man is rebellious

verses.content: أَن رَّآهُ اسْتَغْنَىٰ
verses.translation: That he thinketh himself independent!

verses.content: إِنَّ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ الرُّجْعَىٰ
verses.translation: Lo! unto thy Lord is the return.

verses.content: أَرَأَيْتَ الَّذِي يَنْهَىٰ
verses.translation: Hast thou seen him who dissuadeth

verses.content: عَبْدًا إِذَا صَلَّىٰ
verses.translation: A slave when he prayeth?

verses.content: أَرَأَيْتَ إِن كَانَ عَلَى الْهُدَىٰ
verses.translation: Hast thou seen if he relieth on the guidance (of Allah)

verses.content: أَوْ أَمَرَ بِالتَّقْوَىٰ
verses.translation: Or enjoineth piety?

verses.content: أَرَأَيْتَ إِن كَذَّبَ وَتَوَلَّىٰ
verses.translation: Hast thou seen if he denieth (Allah's guidance) and is froward?

verses.content: أَلَمْ يَعْلَم بِأَنَّ اللَّهَ يَرَىٰ
verses.translation: Is he then unaware that Allah seeth?

verses.content: كَلَّا لَئِن لَّمْ يَنتَهِ لَنَسْفَعًا بِالنَّاصِيَةِ
verses.translation: Nay, but if he cease not We will seize him by the forelock -

verses.content: نَاصِيَةٍ كَاذِبَةٍ خَاطِئَةٍ
verses.translation: The lying, sinful forelock -

verses.content: فَلْيَدْعُ نَادِيَهُ
verses.translation: Then let him call upon his henchmen!

verses.content: سَنَدْعُ الزَّبَانِيَةَ
verses.translation: We will call the guards of hell.

verses.content: كَلَّا لَا تُطِعْهُ وَاسْجُدْ وَاقْتَرِب ۩
verses.translation: Nay, Obey not thou him. But prostrate thyself, and draw near (unto Allah).

verses.content: بِّسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ إِنَّا أَنزَلْنَاهُ فِي لَيْلَةِ الْقَدْرِ
verses.translation: Lo! We revealed it on the Night of Predestination.

verses.content: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا لَيْلَةُ الْقَدْرِ
verses.translation: Ah, what will convey unto thee what the Night of Power is!

verses.content: لَيْلَةُ الْقَدْرِ خَيْرٌ مِّنْ أَلْفِ شَهْرٍ
verses.translation: The Night of Power is better than a thousand months.

verses.content: تَنَزَّلُ الْمَلَائِكَةُ وَالرُّوحُ فِيهَا بِإِذْنِ رَبِّهِم مِّن كُلِّ أَمْرٍ
verses.translation: The angels and the Spirit descend therein, by the permission of their Lord, with all decrees.

verses.content: سَلَامٌ هِيَ حَتَّىٰ مَطْلَعِ الْفَجْرِ
verses.translation: (The night is) Peace until the rising of the dawn.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ لَمْ يَكُنِ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا مِنْ أَهْلِ الْكِتَابِ وَالْمُشْرِكِينَ مُنفَكِّينَ حَتَّىٰ تَأْتِيَهُمُ الْبَيِّنَةُ
verses.translation: Those who disbelieve among the People of the Scripture and the idolaters could not have left off (erring) till the clear proof came unto them,

verses.content: رَسُولٌ مِّنَ اللَّهِ يَتْلُو صُحُفًا مُّطَهَّرَةً
verses.translation: A messenger from Allah, reading purified pages

verses.content: فِيهَا كُتُبٌ قَيِّمَةٌ
verses.translation: Containing correct scriptures.

verses.content: وَمَا تَفَرَّقَ الَّذِينَ أُوتُوا الْكِتَابَ إِلَّا مِن بَعْدِ مَا جَاءَتْهُمُ الْبَيِّنَةُ
verses.translation: Nor were the People of the Scripture divided until after the clear proof came unto them.

verses.content: وَمَا أُمِرُوا إِلَّا لِيَعْبُدُوا اللَّهَ مُخْلِصِينَ لَهُ الدِّينَ حُنَفَاءَ وَيُقِيمُوا الصَّلَاةَ وَيُؤْتُوا الزَّكَاةَ ۚ وَذَٰلِكَ دِينُ الْقَيِّمَةِ
verses.translation: And they are ordered naught else than to serve Allah, keeping religion pure for Him, as men by nature upright, and to establish worship and to pay the poor-due. That is true religion.

verses.content: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا مِنْ أَهْلِ الْكِتَابِ وَالْمُشْرِكِينَ فِي نَارِ جَهَنَّمَ خَالِدِينَ فِيهَا ۚ أُولَـٰئِكَ هُمْ شَرُّ الْبَرِيَّةِ
verses.translation: Lo! those who disbelieve, among the People of the Scripture and the idolaters, will abide in fire of hell. They are the worst of created beings.

verses.content: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ أُولَـٰئِكَ هُمْ خَيْرُ الْبَرِيَّةِ
verses.translation: (And) lo! those who believe and do good works are the best of created beings.

verses.content: جَزَاؤُهُمْ عِندَ رَبِّهِمْ جَنَّاتُ عَدْنٍ تَجْرِي مِن تَحْتِهَا الْأَنْهَارُ خَالِدِينَ فِيهَا أَبَدًا ۖ رَّضِيَ اللَّهُ عَنْهُمْ وَرَضُوا عَنْهُ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ لِمَنْ خَشِيَ رَبَّهُ
verses.translation: Their reward is with their Lord: Gardens of Eden underneath which rivers flow, wherein they dwell for ever. Allah hath pleasure in them and they have pleasure in Him. This is (in store) for him who feareth his Lord.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ إِذَا زُلْزِلَتِ الْأَرْضُ زِلْزَالَهَا
verses.translation: When Earth is shaken with her (final) earthquake

verses.content: وَأَخْرَجَتِ الْأَرْضُ أَثْقَالَهَا
verses.translation: And Earth yieldeth up her burdens,

verses.content: وَقَالَ الْإِنسَانُ مَا لَهَا
verses.translation: And man saith: What aileth her?

verses.content: يَوْمَئِذٍ تُحَدِّثُ أَخْبَارَهَا
verses.translation: That day she will relate her chronicles,

verses.content: بِأَنَّ رَبَّكَ أَوْحَىٰ لَهَا
verses.translation: Because thy Lord inspireth her.

verses.content: يَوْمَئِذٍ يَصْدُرُ النَّاسُ أَشْتَاتًا لِّيُرَوْا أَعْمَالَهُمْ
verses.translation: That day mankind will issue forth in scattered groups to be shown their deeds.

verses.content: فَمَن يَعْمَلْ مِثْقَالَ ذَرَّةٍ خَيْرًا يَرَهُ
verses.translation: And whoso doeth good an atom's weight will see it then,

verses.content: وَمَن يَعْمَلْ مِثْقَالَ ذَرَّةٍ شَرًّا يَرَهُ
verses.translation: And whoso doeth ill an atom's weight will see it then.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَالْعَادِيَاتِ ضَبْحًا
verses.translation: By the snorting courses,

verses.content: فَالْمُورِيَاتِ قَدْحًا
verses.translation: Striking sparks of fire

verses.content: فَالْمُغِيرَاتِ صُبْحًا
verses.translation: And scouring to the raid at dawn,

verses.content: فَأَثَرْنَ بِهِ نَقْعًا
verses.translation: Then, therewith, with their trail of dust,

verses.content: فَوَسَطْنَ بِهِ جَمْعًا
verses.translation: Cleaving, as one, the centre (of the foe),

verses.content: إِنَّ الْإِنسَانَ لِرَبِّهِ لَكَنُودٌ
verses.translation: Lo! man is an ingrate unto his Lord

verses.content: وَإِنَّهُ عَلَىٰ ذَٰلِكَ لَشَهِيدٌ
verses.translation: And lo! he is a witness unto that;

verses.content: وَإِنَّهُ لِحُبِّ الْخَيْرِ لَشَدِيدٌ
verses.translation: And lo! in the love of wealth he is violent.

verses.content: أَفَلَا يَعْلَمُ إِذَا بُعْثِرَ مَا فِي الْقُبُورِ
verses.translation: Knoweth he not that, when the contents of the graves are poured forth

verses.content: وَحُصِّلَ مَا فِي الصُّدُورِ
verses.translation: And the secrets of the breasts are made known,

verses.content: إِنَّ رَبَّهُم بِهِمْ يَوْمَئِذٍ لَّخَبِيرٌ
verses.translation: On that day will their Lord be perfectly informed concerning them.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ الْقَارِعَةُ
verses.translation: The Calamity!

verses.content: مَا الْقَارِعَةُ
verses.translation: What is the Calamity?

verses.content: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا الْقَارِعَةُ
verses.translation: Ah, what will convey unto thee what the Calamity is!

verses.content: يَوْمَ يَكُونُ النَّاسُ كَالْفَرَاشِ الْمَبْثُوثِ
verses.translation: A day wherein mankind will be as thickly-scattered moths

verses.content: وَتَكُونُ الْجِبَالُ كَالْعِهْنِ الْمَنفُوشِ
verses.translation: And the mountains will become as carded wool.

verses.content: فَأَمَّا مَن ثَقُلَتْ مَوَازِينُهُ
verses.translation: Then, as for him whose scales are heavy (with good works),

verses.content: فَهُوَ فِي عِيشَةٍ رَّاضِيَةٍ
verses.translation: He will live a pleasant life.

verses.content: وَأَمَّا مَنْ خَفَّتْ مَوَازِينُهُ
verses.translation: But as for him whose scales are light,

verses.content: فَأُمُّهُ هَاوِيَةٌ
verses.translation: A bereft and Hungry One will be his mother,

verses.content: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا هِيَهْ
verses.translation: Ah, what will convey unto thee what she is! -

verses.content: نَارٌ حَامِيَةٌ
verses.translation: Raging Fire.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ أَلْهَاكُمُ التَّكَاثُرُ
verses.translation: Rivalry in worldly increase distracteth you

verses.content: حَتَّىٰ زُرْتُمُ الْمَقَابِرَ
verses.translation: Until ye come to the graves.

verses.content: كَلَّا سَوْفَ تَعْلَمُونَ
verses.translation: Nay, but ye will come to know!

verses.content: ثُمَّ كَلَّا سَوْفَ تَعْلَمُونَ
verses.translation: Nay, but ye will come to know!

verses.content: كَلَّا لَوْ تَعْلَمُونَ عِلْمَ الْيَقِينِ
verses.translation: Nay, would that ye knew (now) with a sure knowledge!

verses.content: لَتَرَوُنَّ الْجَحِيمَ
verses.translation: For ye will behold hell-fire.

verses.content: ثُمَّ لَتَرَوُنَّهَا عَيْنَ الْيَقِينِ
verses.translation: Aye, ye will behold it with sure vision.

verses.content: ثُمَّ لَتُسْأَلُنَّ يَوْمَئِذٍ عَنِ النَّعِيمِ
verses.translation: Then, on that day, ye will be asked concerning pleasure.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَالْعَصْرِ
verses.translation: By the declining day,

verses.content: إِنَّ الْإِنسَانَ لَفِي خُسْرٍ
verses.translation: Lo! man is a state of loss,

verses.content: إِلَّا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ وَتَوَاصَوْا بِالْحَقِّ وَتَوَاصَوْا بِالصَّبْرِ
verses.translation: Save those who believe and do good works, and exhort one another to truth and exhort one another to endurance.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَيْلٌ لِّكُلِّ هُمَزَةٍ لُّمَزَةٍ
verses.translation: Woe unto every slandering traducer,

verses.content: الَّذِي جَمَعَ مَالًا وَعَدَّدَهُ
verses.translation: Who hath gathered wealth (of this world) and arranged it.

verses.content: يَحْسَبُ أَنَّ مَالَهُ أَخْلَدَهُ
verses.translation: He thinketh that his wealth will render him immortal.

verses.content: كَلَّا ۖ لَيُنبَذَنَّ فِي الْحُطَمَةِ
verses.translation: Nay, but verily he will be flung to the Consuming One.

verses.content: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا الْحُطَمَةُ
verses.translation: Ah, what will convey unto thee what the Consuming One is!

verses.content: نَارُ اللَّهِ الْمُوقَدَةُ
verses.translation: (It is) the fire of Allah, kindled,

verses.content: الَّتِي تَطَّلِعُ عَلَى الْأَفْئِدَةِ
verses.translation: Which leapeth up over the hearts (of men).

verses.content: إِنَّهَا عَلَيْهِم مُّؤْصَدَةٌ
verses.translation: Lo! it is closed in on them

verses.content: فِي عَمَدٍ مُّمَدَّدَةٍ
verses.translation: In outstretched columns.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ أَلَمْ تَرَ كَيْفَ فَعَلَ رَبُّكَ بِأَصْحَابِ الْفِيلِ
verses.translation: Hast thou not seen how thy Lord dealt with the owners of the Elephant?

verses.content: أَلَمْ يَجْعَلْ كَيْدَهُمْ فِي تَضْلِيلٍ
verses.translation: Did He not bring their stratagem to naught,

verses.content: وَأَرْسَلَ عَلَيْهِمْ طَيْرًا أَبَابِيلَ
verses.translation: And send against them swarms of flying creatures,

verses.content: تَرْمِيهِم بِحِجَارَةٍ مِّن سِجِّيلٍ
verses.translation: Which pelted them with stones of baked clay,

verses.content: فَجَعَلَهُمْ كَعَصْفٍ مَّأْكُولٍ
verses.translation: And made them like green crops devoured (by cattle)?

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ لِإِيلَافِ قُرَيْشٍ
verses.translation: For the taming of Qureysh.

verses.content: إِيلَافِهِمْ رِحْلَةَ الشِّتَاءِ وَالصَّيْفِ
verses.translation: For their taming (We cause) the caravans to set forth in winter and summer.

verses.content: فَلْيَعْبُدُوا رَبَّ هَـٰذَا الْبَيْتِ
verses.translation: So let them worship the Lord of this House,

verses.content: الَّذِي أَطْعَمَهُم مِّن جُوعٍ وَآمَنَهُم مِّنْ خَوْفٍ
verses.translation: Who hath fed them against hunger and hath made them safe from fear.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ أَرَأَيْتَ الَّذِي يُكَذِّبُ بِالدِّينِ
verses.translation: Hast thou observed him who belieth religion?

verses.content: فَذَٰلِكَ الَّذِي يَدُعُّ الْيَتِيمَ
verses.translation: That is he who repelleth the orphan,

verses.content: وَلَا يَحُضُّ عَلَىٰ طَعَامِ الْمِسْكِينِ
verses.translation: And urgeth not the feeding of the needy.

verses.content: فَوَيْلٌ لِّلْمُصَلِّينَ
verses.translation: Ah, woe unto worshippers

verses.content: الَّذِينَ هُمْ عَن صَلَاتِهِمْ سَاهُونَ
verses.translation: Who are heedless of their prayer;

verses.content: الَّذِينَ هُمْ يُرَاءُونَ
verses.translation: Who would be seen (at worship)

verses.content: وَيَمْنَعُونَ الْمَاعُونَ
verses.translation: Yet refuse small kindnesses!

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ إِنَّا أَعْطَيْنَاكَ الْكَوْثَرَ
verses.translation: Lo! We have given thee Abundance;

verses.content: فَصَلِّ لِرَبِّكَ وَانْحَرْ
verses.translation: So pray unto thy Lord, and sacrifice.

verses.content: إِنَّ شَانِئَكَ هُوَ الْأَبْتَرُ
verses.translation: Lo! it is thy insulter (and not thou) who is without posterity.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ قُلْ يَا أَيُّهَا الْكَافِرُونَ
verses.translation: Say: O disbelievers!

verses.content: لَا أَعْبُدُ مَا تَعْبُدُونَ
verses.translation: I worship not that which ye worship;

verses.content: وَلَا أَنتُمْ عَابِدُونَ مَا أَعْبُدُ
verses.translation: Nor worship ye that which I worship.

verses.content: وَلَا أَنَا عَابِدٌ مَّا عَبَدتُّمْ
verses.translation: And I shall not worship that which ye worship.

verses.content: وَلَا أَنتُمْ عَابِدُونَ مَا أَعْبُدُ
verses.translation: Nor will ye worship that which I worship.

verses.content: لَكُمْ دِينُكُمْ وَلِيَ دِينِ
verses.translation: Unto you your religion, and unto me my religion.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ إِذَا جَاءَ نَصْرُ اللَّهِ وَالْفَتْحُ
verses.translation: When Allah's succour and the triumph cometh

verses.content: وَرَأَيْتَ النَّاسَ يَدْخُلُونَ فِي دِينِ اللَّهِ أَفْوَاجًا
verses.translation: And thou seest mankind entering the religion of Allah in troops,

verses.content: فَسَبِّحْ بِحَمْدِ رَبِّكَ وَاسْتَغْفِرْهُ ۚ إِنَّهُ كَانَ تَوَّابًا
verses.translation: Then hymn the praises of thy Lord, and seek forgiveness of Him. Lo! He is ever ready to show mercy.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ تَبَّتْ يَدَا أَبِي لَهَبٍ وَتَبَّ
verses.translation: The power of Abu Lahab will perish, and he will perish.

verses.content: مَا أَغْنَىٰ عَنْهُ مَالُهُ وَمَا كَسَبَ
verses.translation: His wealth and gains will not exempt him.

verses.content: سَيَصْلَىٰ نَارًا ذَاتَ لَهَبٍ
verses.translation: He will be plunged in flaming Fire,

verses.content: وَامْرَأَتُهُ حَمَّالَةَ الْحَطَبِ
verses.translation: And his wife, the wood-carrier,

verses.content: فِي جِيدِهَا حَبْلٌ مِّن مَّسَدٍ
verses.translation: Will have upon her neck a halter of palm-fibre.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ قُلْ هُوَ اللَّهُ أَحَدٌ
verses.translation: Say: He is Allah, the One!

verses.content: اللَّهُ الصَّمَدُ
verses.translation: Allah, the eternally Besought of all!

verses.content: لَمْ يَلِدْ وَلَمْ يُولَدْ
verses.translation: He begetteth not nor was begotten.

verses.content: وَلَمْ يَكُن لَّهُ كُفُوًا أَحَدٌ
verses.translation: And there is none comparable unto Him.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ قُلْ أَعُوذُ بِرَبِّ الْفَلَقِ
verses.translation: Say: I seek refuge in the Lord of the Daybreak

verses.content: مِن شَرِّ مَا خَلَقَ
verses.translation: From the evil of that which He created;

verses.content: وَمِن شَرِّ غَاسِقٍ إِذَا وَقَبَ
verses.translation: From the evil of the darkness when it is intense,

verses.content: وَمِن شَرِّ النَّفَّاثَاتِ فِي الْعُقَدِ
verses.translation: And from the evil of malignant witchcraft,

verses.content: وَمِن شَرِّ حَاسِدٍ إِذَا حَسَدَ
verses.translation: And from the evil of the envier when he envieth.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ قُلْ أَعُوذُ بِرَبِّ النَّاسِ
verses.translation: Say: I seek refuge in the Lord of mankind,

verses.content: مَلِكِ النَّاسِ
verses.translation: The King of mankind,

verses.content: إِلَـٰهِ النَّاسِ
verses.translation: The god of mankind,

verses.content: مِن شَرِّ الْوَسْوَاسِ الْخَنَّاسِ
verses.translation: From the evil of the sneaking whisperer,

verses.content: الَّذِي يُوَسْوِسُ فِي صُدُورِ النَّاسِ
verses.translation: Who whispereth in the hearts of mankind,

verses.content: مِنَ الْجِنَّةِ وَالنَّاسِ
verses.translation: Of the jinn and of mankind.
